artist: Artist: Valentin Popov; Designer: Stephen Black; Publisher: The Gordian Press, San Rafael, California; Printer: Etchings printed by Valentin Popov; Printer: Letterpress by Leda Black; Maker: Folio box by Booklab, Austin , Texas
creditline: Gift of Dr. Ralph and Rachelle Bennett
description: green brocade cloth-covered box with copper engraving plate affixed to top

signed: Signed and dated in pencil on colophon page: [Popov 96]. Each etching is signed, dated, and titled in pencil in bottom margin.
title: Torrents of Spring
